In England, in the seven days to 27 November, there were 247,874 new confirmed cases (438.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 November, there were 243,294 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% (4,580 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 December is 8,758,744 (15,488.5 cases per 100,000 population).
